DOC.brief_summary: The overall purpose research determine effect ultrasound image biofeedback urine leakage , pelvic floor muscle contraction , quality life woman stress urinary incontinence . This study include woman 20 year old stress urinary incontinence . The study involve 2 group : pelvic floor muscle ( PFM ) exercise biofeedback use transabdominal Rehabilitative ultrasound imaging ( RUSI ) ( Group A ) PFM exercise alone ( Group B ) . The participant perform 16 exercise session period 8 week . Group A perform 3 pelvic floor exercise use transabdominal RUSI provide biofeedback . Group B perform 3 pelvic floor exercise without biofeedback . All participant involve study complete general medical information questionnaire . In addition , participant PFM contraction assess use ultrasound machine place low abdomen , quality life assess write questionnaire , give 7-day bladder diary complete prior , 4-weeks , completion study .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Exercise Biofeedback Symptoms Incontinence Women With Stress Urinary Incontinence
DOC.criteria: 1. woman need 20 year old 2. diagnosed stress urinary incontinence ( SUI ) . woman : 1. urge mixed incontinence 2. pelvic organ prolapse 3. previous surgical treatment incontinence 4. current treatment SUI ( include medication ) 5. current pregnancy 6. six month le postpartum 7. body mass index â‰¥ 30 8. recurrent vulvovaginitis 9. current/recurrent urinary tract infection ( UTI ) 10. nonEnglish speaking .
